Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your store's made over 10,000,000G worth of
sales?! Th-that's incredible!!

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear your store's sold over 1,000,000G worth
of stuff!
<PAGE>
That's amazing! When I see people my age
working that hard, it always motivates me to try
and keep up.

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear you've topped 100,000G worth of sales.
<PAGE>
You've got a good selection here. I see why
you're getting so much business.

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes! I found what I wanted! ♪

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You ever get that rush from dropping a whole lot
of money on something really expensive? I do!

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, whoa, I blew through all my cash again!

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Didn't find what I wanted this time. Next time,
maybe!

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I guess some days, you happen to find what you
want, and other days, you're not so lucky, yeah?

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I decided not to buy anything today.

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Woo, this paycheck's burning a hole in my
pocket! ♪

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hope I can find some top-notch crops today!

<NAME_MOB_EDELTRUD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are there any good crops around today?
